replies.author: 游骑兵_Ranger
replies.txt_content:
标题: [1.7.10/1.7.2][SSP/SMP][全平台]The RC Mod 本帖最后由 sb023612 于 2014-8-6 00:44 编辑 

大家好我是ranger，今天给大家搬运来一个mod，遥控模型The RC mod（不是铁路mod那个）
【The RC Mod is an advanced Remote Control vehicle modification for the game Minecraft. The RC Mod introduces many fully interactive Remote Control Vehicles into your custom built world played and controlled in game. Featuring the most advanced flight dynamics and ground physics currently available. The RC Mod outperforms any other mod available. This is the first mod to introduce the full “6 degrees of freedom” to the game offering you the most immersive and realistic in game experience yet.】

【该RC MOD是一种先进的远程控制汽车改装比赛的Minecraft。该RC国防部介绍了许多完全交互式的远程控制车辆进入您定制的全球播放，并且在游戏中控制。拥有国内最先进的飞行动力学和物理学地面目前可用。该RC国防部优于任何其他MOD可用。这是第一个MOD推出完整的“6自由度”游戏为您提供最身临其境的逼真的游戏体验。】



https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=JBX5dK4JkLA
合成表
















下载地址1.72：
点我下载

replies.author: BYWJ
replies.txt_content: 虽然是重复了，一半吧...，不过这其实是第二代的，更新了不少东西，但是...你能不能吧正常的安装方法搞下，我不会坑这个MOD！

replies.txt_content: 机翻···········不过这mod已经很久没更新过了··········

replies.author: ufo999wc
replies.txt_content: 这年头别人搬运的mod我越来越看不懂了！看介绍觉得好高深的样子啊！
